Staff, DVC, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process. Note: This section is a required part of DVC's Academy for Student Athletes. Students must be a current student athlete to enroll. For registration information, please contact Ervin Anderson at eanderson@dvc.edu and Jimmy Collins at jcollins@dvc.edu. Note: Class meets on campus as scheduled.

Agnost, Catherine, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process. Note: This section is an optional part of DVC's Umoja Learning Community. For program and registration information, please visit http://www.dvc.edu/umoja Note: Partially online course with required meetings Tuesdays 9:35 AM-11:00 AM(on-campus, see room on schedule) with all other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
